title.native: 機動戦士ガンダム 水星の魔女 Season2
title.romaji: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo Season 2
title.english: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury Season 2

description:
The second season of Mobile Suit Gundam: the Witch from Mercury.

A.S.122...
An era when a multitude of corporations have entered space and built a huge economic system. After transferring to the Asticassia School of Technology from the planet Mercury, Suletta Mercury has experienced a school life filled with encounters and excitement, as both Miorine Rembran's bridegroom and a member of GUND-ARM, Inc.

It has been two weeks since the incident at Plant Quetta. Suletta passes her days at the school, anticipating her reunion with Miorine. Miorine, meanwhile, has stationed herself at the head office of the Benerit Group, monitoring her father's condition. The two are about to face new hardships and pressing decisions. Each with her own feelings in her heart, the girls will confront the mighty curse the Gundam brings.

(Source: GUNDAM.INFO, edited)
synonyms: 機動戰士鋼彈 水星的魔女 Season2
Мобильный воин Гандам: Ведьма с Меркурия

node.description:
[Website](http://www.yatate.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yatate_hajime) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/矢立肇) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hajime_Yatate)

Hajime Yatate is a collective pseudonym for [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/)'s staff.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/富野由悠季) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yoshiyuki_Tomino)

Yoshiyuki Tomino is an anime creator best known for creating the Gundam anime franchise.

Began his career in 1963 with [Osamu Tezuka](https://anilist.co/staff/96938/)'s company, [Mushi Production](https://anilist.co/studio/68/), scripting and directing episodes of the first Japanese anime television series, [Astro Boy](https://anilist.co/anime/2747/). He later became one of the most important members of the anime studio [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/), going on to direct numerous anime through the '70s, '80s and '90s. He is perhaps best known for his transformation of the "Super Robot" mecha anime genre into the "Real Robot" genre with 1979's [Mobile Suit Gundam](https://anilist.co/anime/80/), the first in the Gundam franchise.

Known for using numerous pseudonyms.

(Source: Wikipedia)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/douhwe) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ya.ma_00/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClbieOB_NYcY9TlIthmyw-A) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@yama_official_tiktok)__

__Introduction:__
yama is a Japanese vocalist affiliated with the record label MASTERSIX FOUNDATION (2020–). They have been active since 2018, but didn't make their debut before November 2019, where they appeared as a guest vocalist on the song "[Nemuru Machi](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ePBjUMEeqBw)", produced by vocaloid producer [Kujira](https://twitter.com/WhaleDontSleep).

__Biography:__
After their initial debut, yama wouldn't reappear before later on April 17, 2020, where they released their first original song titled "[Haru wo Tsugeru](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DC6JppqHkaM)". Later in the same year on October 21, they made their major debut with the song "[Masshiro](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lj64XpVS7dk)" through the record label MASTERSIX FOUNDATION.

Close to the end of 2020, on December 18, yama made their first physical appearance on the channel 'THE FIRST TAKE', performing their song Haru wo Tsugeru.

At the beginning of 2021, yama made their first appearance in anime with the song "[Mahi](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2By3feOVw20)", which was used as the opening theme song to the anime 2.43: Seiin High School Boys Volleyball Team. The song is their first CD single, which released on February 10, 2021.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ichirou_o)

Waseda University graduate. Best known as the co-creator of [Code Geass](https://anilist.co/anime/1575/).

[Profile](https://www.nichionsakka.com/takashi-ohmama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takashi_ohmama) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/takashi_ohmama/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/08JdrX1itYADF3msockY6y)

Composer belonging to composer management NIchion.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ichirou_o)

Waseda University graduate. Best known as the co-creator of [Code Geass](https://anilist.co/anime/1575/).
